name: javascript_project_main
description: root package and app_react web_react server_express run and node_module

scripts.install:clean:linux: npm cache clean --force & rm -rf node_modules/ & rm -rf package-lock.json && npm run install:clean:linux --workspace=packages/server_express && npm run install:clean:linux --workspace=packages/web_react
scripts.install:clean:win: npm cache clean --force & rd /s /q node_modules & del /f /q /a package-lock.json && npm run install:clean:win --workspaces
